ygData.subject: I have a question.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, has anyone I mean ANYONE on this mailing list been able to raise your skill in tinkering? Just on point? If you did tell us how so that we can try that
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, has anyone I mean ANYONE on this mailing list been able to raise your
skill in tinkering? Just on point? If you did tell us how so that we can try
that too. If no one on the list has risen even a point, then we REALLY need
to petition about tinkering. We need to tell them to start working on it and
get it at least as finished as brewing or another skill like that. I think
we are just going on a wild goose chaase here. We are probably looking for
something that doesn't even exist yet. Anyways, tinkering needs to be
changed so that skill points can be gotten easier anyway. We need to get
this through to Verant. We should no longer just stand by, hoping Verant
will come through, and spending tons of money trying to get skill points. We
must act!

Sniffledoo Copperheart 15th rank warrior of The Scarlet Blade --
Veeshan
